title: Natural Mosquito Treatment Option
description: Don't let biting bugs ruin your special day! Our squad is ready to knock down mosquitoes, ticks, fleas, and more with special event outdoor pest control services.
cleaned_text: Does natural mosquito repellant work? The essential oils in natural mosquito repellents work by blocking mosquitoes' sense of smell and making it difficult for them to land on human skin. It's a similar effect to the chemical DEET. [Studies have shown](https://malariajournal.biomedcentral.com/articles/10.1186/1475-2875-10-S1-S11) that natural repellents work as effectively as their synthetic chemical counterparts when applied consistently. For example, an [American College of Clinical Pharmacy](https://accpjournals.onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/10.1002/phar.1854) study found that certain essential oils ranked just behind DEET in terms of effectively repelling mosquitoes. Recently, lemon-eucalyptus essential oil was registered with the [Environmental Protection Agency (EPA)](https://www.epa.gov/insect-repellents/find-repellent-right-you) and approved by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) as a safer and effective non-toxic mosquito repellent. How long does natural mosquito treatment last? Our natural mosquito treatment can successfully keep mosquitoes and ticks at bay for up to 14 days. With routine sprays, our highly trained technicians can help ensure your property receives max mosquito protection all season long. (Other professional or store-bought products have varying effectiveness.) How much does natural mosquito treatment cost? Pricing for our natural mosquito treatment plans vary by location, property size, and frequency of service. We'll offer an up-front, straightforward quote free of hidden fees. Our goal is to take care of your mosquito and tick problems without breaking your budget.
